#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
         long int n,m,sum=0,y;
         cin>>n;
         
         m=n;
         
         while(m!=0)
         {
           sum=sum+m%10;
           m=m/10;
         }
          
         y=n%sum;
         
         cout<<y<<"\n";
    }
    
    return 0;
}
